labels.analysis: The MCP Server is focused on generating high-quality images using an AI model (Flux.1 Schnell). Its primary functionality revolves around creating visual content based on customizable parameters, making it a tool for producing visual media. The available tool "generate_image" indicates that this is a dedicated server for image generation tasks.
labels.reasoning: The server's core functionality aligns perfectly with content creation, particularly in the realm of visual media generation. While AI/ML Tools could also be applied due to the underlying model, the primary use case is clearly tied to generating images for various purposes. Additional secondary labels like Content Creation are relevant as they reflect the broader application of its output.

server_info_crawled.overview: Generate high-quality images effortlessly using customizable parameters. Leverage the power of the Flux.1 Schnell model to create stunning visuals tailored to your needs. Integrate seamlessly with MCP-compatible clients for enhanced functionality.

tools.name: generate_image
tools.description: Deploy Server Image Generation Server @manascb1344/together-mcp-server Try in Playground generate_image

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@manascb1344/together-mcp-server/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
